response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Given its importance and the benefits it offers, we propose a purchase price of $800,000. We understand that this might seem a bit below the product's perceived value to you, but we are confident that it represents a fair deal considering the current market conditions and our commitment to finding the right buyer. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 800000}
